import {Suspense} from "react" import {useMarketItem} from "../hooks/use-market-item.hook" import {useCurrentUser} from "../hooks/use-current-user.hook" import {IDLE} from "../global/constants" import { Tr, Td, Button, Spinner, Flex, Center, Text, HStack, } from "@chakra-ui/react" import {ItemImage} from "./account-item-cluster.comp" export function MarketItemCluster({address, id}) { const [cu, loggedIn] = useCurrentUser() const item = useMarketItem(address, id) const BUSY = item.status !== IDLE || item.status !== IDLE return ( #{item.itemID} ({item.typeID}) {item.price} {loggedIn && ( <> {item.owner === cu.addr ? ( ) : ( )} )} ) } export default function WrappedMarketItemCluster(props) { return ( #{props.id}
} > ) }
